practice_phrases.target: Are you going to help me?
Are you going to speak English?
Are you going to come today?
Are you going to learn with me?

practice_phrases.known: 你会在晚上之前完成吗？
practice_phrases.target: Are you going to finish before evening?

practice_phrases.known: 你会在明天帮我学习吗？
practice_phrases.target: Are you going to help me learn tomorrow?

practice_phrases.known: 你会很快准备好，还是你会花很多时间？
practice_phrases.target: Are you going to be ready soon, or are you going to take much time?

practice_phrases.known: 你会在我必须走之前帮我说这个英语句子吗？
practice_phrases.target: Are you going to help me say this English sentence before I have to go?
